# type

**Instance Property**

The push type constant associated with the token.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: PKPushType { get }
```

## Discussion

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.pushkit/documentation/PushKit/PKPushType].

## Getting the Token

- **token**: A unique device token to use when sending push notifications to the current device.
